title: 37: Run, Rose, Run
itunes:title: Run, Rose, Run
description: In this episode of The Readheads the girlies are discussing Run, Rose, Run by James Patterson and Dolly Parton. An epic collab. The Readheads are sharing all the things they loved about the book and some of the things they didn't. As always they share their picks for who they'd cast in a movie adaptation of this book and they share and rate all of the other books they read this month. The next book is Becky's choice and she chose Girls with Bright Futures by Tracy Dobmeier and Wendy Katzman. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com Shop Readheads Merch: https://shopmorningtoast.com/collections/the-readheads The overall Readheads Rating for Run, Rose, Run is 3.8.
